attributes.action: Ask for the Rev Mike Walsh's personal letter to David Cameron to acknowledged.
attributes.additional_details: Typing Rev Mike Walsh on facebook or Twitter will prove all the information required.
attributes.background: Rev Mike Walsh has wrote a letter to David Cameron inviting him to experience true life of the people whom he sets his changed policies against, the disabled etc, it has been well published on facebook (over 108 000 followers) and Twitter, why is he being ignored?
